channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Optimism set to unlock $587M worth of OP tokens, will investors unload?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: More than 386 million OP tokens are scheduled to be unlocked on May 31, more than doubling the total circulating supply.

item.title: Crypto firms jockey for Hong Kong licenses ahead of June 1 retail opening
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Hong Kong’s retail trading regime is days away from going live and crypto exchanges are keen to make entry into the region.

item.title: Deal to avoid US debt default nixes proposed 30% crypto mining tax, says Ohio lawmaker
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Rep. Warren Davidson, legislation to address the U.S. debt ceiling blocks “proposed taxes,” including a 30% tax on electricity used by crypto miners.

item.title: Laos government reportedly prioritizes blockchain technology for digital transformation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Laotian Prime Minister Sonexay Siphandone chaired the inaugural Ministerial Conference on Blockchain 4.0 Digital Transformation.

item.title: From Beijing to Tokyo, Asian nations get active in crypto regulation: Law Decoded, May 22–29
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Lawmakers in Japan have decided to enforce stricter Anti-Money Laundering measures starting June 1 to trace cryptocurrency transactions.

item.title: Price analysis 5/29: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, MATIC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The news of a tentative debt ceiling deal bolstered Bitcoin’s price above $28,000, but higher levels continue to attract selling from the bears.

item.title: Jimbos Protocol offers deal to hacker, threatens police action
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The deal was posted to both the Ethereum network and the protocol’s official Twitter channel.

item.title: Amex planning to use AI for ‘approving cards and lines of credit’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: American Express plans to extend its AI capabilities through partnerships despite having experimented internally with numerous machine learning-powered services.

item.title: Texas legislative session winds down with crypto bills still in limbo
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: State lawmakers passed a proof-of-reserves bill and legislation covering crypto firms’ usage of flare gas, both awaiting Texas Gov. Greg Abbott's approval or veto as of May 29.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: is the Bitcoin bear market over
item.description: Bitcoin price rallied amid cautious optimism over a tentative deal to lift the U.S. debt limit.

item.title: The EU is watching your wallet, but it still beats the US for crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marc Taverner
item.description: Europe is requiring crypto wallet providers to track every move you make, but companies should still consider the region for its regulatory clarity.

item.title: Russia scraps plans for a national cryptocurrency exchange
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Russia will continue to create new crypto platforms in response to sanctions, State Duma official Anatoly Aksakov said.

item.title: Japan launches digital yen pilot project after second successful proof-of-concept
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: With the end of the proofs-of-concept, the Bank of Japan has initiated its CBDC pilot and plans to gather more public and business feedback.

item.title: Bitcoin erodes 4% gains as BTC price downside targets stretch to $23K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: A spike above $28,000 begins to fade as the new week begins, while a U.S. holiday means no external BTC price triggers from equities.

item.title: Environmental impact of AI: Pioneering solutions for a sustainable future
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Shiraz Jagati
item.description: Harnessing AI’s potential responsibly through energy efficiency and sustainable practices.

item.title: AI Eye: 25K traders bet on ChatGPT’s stock picks, AI sucks at dice throws, and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton
item.description: ChatGPT always rolls a 4 but tens of thousands of traders are betting millions on its stock picks, AI expands classic album covers, and more.

item.title: Nvidia introduces AI supercomputer to create ChatGPT successors
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The company behind the world’s most powerful chip for developing AI tools revealed more AI-powered products, including an AI supercomputer platform.

item.title: Ledger CEO says crypto key recovery service makes self-custody easier
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rachel Wolfson
item.description: Ledger’s “Recover” service may be concerning, but some crypto industry participants think the feature may onboard new users while helping crypto natives.

item.title: 7 must-read books for aspiring tech entrepreneurs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Whether you’re a budding entrepreneur or looking to enhance your business skills, explore the seven books that offer a wealth of knowledge to help you thrive in the dynamic tech industry.

item.title: Tourists are unhappy with crypto payments ban in Bali
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The community expressed a range of opinions, with some individuals stating that the ban is reasonable, while others went as far as reconsidering their vacation plans.

item.title: Bybit gets pre-approval in Kazakhstan as crypto custody service provider
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The cryptocurrency exchange received “in-principle” approval to operate in Kazakhstan at the Astana International Financial Centre.

item.title: Mining difficulty passes 50 trillion — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin fundamentals are blasting ahead as May comes to an end, while traders remain torn over BTC price strength.

item.title: BNB NFT marketplace Tabi raises $10M in angel funding
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Notable venture capital firms such as Animoca Brands and Binance Labs took part in the funding round.

item.title: Lawyer uses ChatGPT in court and now ‘greatly regrets’ it
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The court used the word “bogus” to describe the quotes and citations the New York attorney provided, which were sourced from ChatGPT.

item.title: ‘Dealt with firmly’ — Bali governor issues warning to tourists using crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Cryptocurrency trading is legal in Indonesia, but the use of crypto for payments carries hefty penalties, including jail time.

item.title: Debt ceiling, bank crisis set for ‘powder keg’ explosion — BitMEX co-founder
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Former BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes believes it will cause significant volatility in Bitcoin as well, suggesting it won't likely reach a new all-time high this year.

item.title: Reddit collectible avatars onboard nearly 10M into the crypto, NFT space
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: The popular social platform is about to hit a big milestone in terms of collectible avatar holders after launching “Reddit NFTs” in July 2022.

item.title: Temasek slashes compensation for execs responsible for its $275M FTX investment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: While “no misconduct” was determined by Temasek’s internal review, staff involved with the FTX investment will see a dent in their pay package.

item.title: Another dormant Ethereum wallet reawakens after 8 years, moving millions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Its owner acquired the tokens during Ethereum’s ICO in 2015, when each ETH was worth only 31 cents each.

item.title: 7 presidential candidates have dropped clues about their crypto stance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Here’s what the Democratic and Republican candidates running for the job of president of the United States have said about crypto.
